AD_Sign.synopsis: Signpost between the Risen Road and Last Light, also points across a chasm towards the town

automatic_ordering.reasoning: Since there is only one session (AD_Sign) provided without any other sessions to compare or link it to, there are no ordering constraints or exclusiveness/mutual exclusion rules that can be established.

AD_Sign_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_Sign_0.text:
*North - Last Light Inn
South - Risen Road
West - Reithwin Town*
